briefTitle: ALK21-021: A Safety Study of Medisorb速 Naltrexone (VIVITROL速) Administered to Health Care Professionals
officialTitle: Open-Label Study of the Safety and Tolerability of VIVITROL Administered to Health Care Professionals Participating in an Extended Outpatient Treatment Program for Opioid Dependence
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and tolerability of Medisorb速 naltrexone (VIVITROL速) when administered over a period of 24 months to health care professionals who have a history of opioid dependence.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects Reporting at Least 1 Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE) While on Study.
